mapper.insert: UPDATE VERIFICATION SET REPORT_ID = #{report_id}, DIVISION_ID = #{division_id}, PLAN_ID = #{plan_id}, SAMPLE_DATA = #{sample_data}, RESULT_NUMBER = #{result_number}, RESULT_BLANK = #{result_blank}, RESULT_STANDARD = #{result_standard}, RESULT_CONTROL = #{result_control}, RESULT_MIN = #{result_min}, RESULT_MAX = #{result_max}, MODIFY_DATE = sysdate WHERE VERIFICATION_ID = #{verification_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT v.*,r.prj_dtl_no, r.prj_dtl_nm, d.division, p.plan_code, g1.genetic crop_list, g2.genetic kind_list, m.method_result FROM verification v LEFT OUTER JOIN report r on r.report_id = v.report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d on v.division_id = d.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN plan p on p.plan_id = v.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_seed ps on ps.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN seed s on ps.seed_id = s.seed_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on g2.genetic_id = s.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g1.genetic_id = g2.genetic_parents LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_method pm on pm.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on pm.method_id = m.method_id
AND v.VERIFICATION_ID = #{verification_id}
